author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Can you add
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot?

Done! 
I've just pushed a 0.2.1 tag at #948 that incorporates the interface for MLJ.
Please just update the PR instead of creating a new one next time.
